original_text: Absalom and all Israel's leaders said, ‘Hushai's idea is better than Ahithophel's idea.’ This happened because the Lord did not let the people accept Ahithophel's advice. His idea was a good one, but the Lord had decided to cause trouble for Absalom.
korean_text: 압살롬과 온 이스라엘 사람들이 이르되 아렉 사람 후새의 계략은 아히도벨의 계략보다 낫다 하니 이는 여호와께서 압살롬에게 화를 내리려 하사 아히도벨의 좋은 계략을 물리치라고 명령하셨음이더라

sentences.original_text: Absalom and all Israel's leaders said
'Hushai's idea is better than Ahithophel's idea.'
This happened because the Lord did not let
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 주님께서 허락하지 않으셨기 때문에 일어났다

sentences.original_text: His idea was a good one
